name: gmail_read_inbox
description: Read messages from the Gmail inbox. Navigates to Gmail, waits for the inbox to load, and scrapes the top N messages with sender, subject, preview, date, unread status, and starred status. You must be logged in to Gmail.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of inbox messages to read (default: 10)

steps.code: const count = parseInt(`{{count}}`) || 10; const rows = document.querySelectorAll('tr.zA'); const messages = []; for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(rows.length, count); i++) { const row = rows[i]; const senderEl = row.querySelector('.yX .yW span[email], .zF'); const subjectEl = row.querySelector('.bog span, .y6 span'); const previewEl = row.querySelector('.y2'); const dateEl = row.querySelector('.xW span[title], .xW span'); const isUnread = row.classList.contains('zE'); const starEl = row.querySelector('.T-KT'); const isStarred = starEl ? starEl.classList.contains('T-KT-Jp') : false; messages.push({ sender: senderEl ? (senderEl.getAttribute('email') || senderEl.getAttribute('name') || senderEl.textContent.trim()) : '', subject: subjectEl ? subjectEl.textContent.trim() : '', preview: previewEl ? previewEl.textContent.trim().replace(/^\s*-\s*/, '') : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('title') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', unread: isUnread, starred: isStarred }); } return { inbox_count: messages.length, messages: messages }
steps.name: inbox_messages
steps.label: Scrape inbox messages
